start_message: Hello, {first_name}! Welcome to our tree planting project.
language_set: Your language has been set to English.
referral_message:
Invite your friends using this link:
{referral_link}
payment_message:
To plant a tree, send *{amount} TON* to the wallet:

`{wallet_address}`

⚠️ *Don't forget to include MEMO*:
`{memo}`

You have {expiration_time} minutes to complete the payment. After a successful payment, the tree will be planted! 🌳
confirming_payment_message: ⏳ Payment is being confirmed. This may take a few minutes...
payment_confirmed_message: ✅ Payment confirmed! You planted a tree for {amount_received:.2f} TON.
thank_you_donation_message: 🌱 Thank you for your donation of {amount_received:.2f} TON, but {min_donation:.2f} TON is required to plant a tree.
payment_not_found_message: ❌ Payment not found. Please check your transaction and try again.
memo_cancelled: Invoice with MEMO: {memo} has been cancelled.
donation_request_message: To plant a tree, please send 1 TON to the following wallet address: [WALLET_ADDRESS].
tree_planted_message: 🌱 You have successfully planted a tree! Total trees planted: {trees_planted}
level_progress_message: 📈 You are at level {current_level}. You have {xp} XP. To reach level {next_level}, you need {xp_needed} more XP.
max_level_message: 🎉 You have reached the maximum level {current_level}!
my_trees_message: 🌳 You have planted a total of {trees_planted} trees.
no_donations_message: You have not made any donations yet.
raffle_info_message:
🎁 Prize Draw Information:

Next prize draw will be announced on [Date]. Stay tuned for updates and participate by planting trees!
registered_via_referral: You are registered via referral link from user {referrer_id}.
welcome_main_menu: 🏠 Welcome! Here is the main menu:
use_main_menu: Hi! Use the main menu to interact with the bot.
